Package net.livebookstore.business

Business facade serves web MVC and web services, and hides database operation details.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BusinessService Core service interface for business logic.
MailService Create and send mails.
SearchService Search and index books.
 

Package net.livebookstore.business Description

Business facade serves web MVC and web services, and hides database operation details.
